#summary List of definitions and names for terms used in Budabot

= Terms and Naming Conventions =

Since there are often several terms that mean the same thing for many ideas related to Budabot and Anarchy Online in general, this page attempts to declare which term will be used in the Budabot interface, documentation, and forums to identify a given idea.

= List of terms =
  * *access level* - admin level, privilege, 
  * *guild channel* - org chat, org channel
  * *module declaration file* - the file that registers the settings, events, commands, etc for a module (eg, _/ITEMS_MODULE/ITEMS_MODULE.php_)
  * *private channel* - guest channel, raid channel, private group
  * *private message* - referred to as a "tell" most commonly in game
